name: Gentlemen... Ricochet Mini!
description:
Gent Mini is a remake/demake/sequel of "Gentlemen... Ricochet!", rethought completely as a simple one-button game. Play as the Gentleman himself and visit every pub in town to play some games of the ridiculously popular table game of Ricochet.

  • Simple One-Button gameplay
  • 72 brand-new levels
  • modern 144p graphics
  • 4 unbeliavable shades of green
  • Boss Battles
  • Awesome new chiptune soundtrack
  • 3 Unlockable Mini-games
  • 2P Local Battle Mode

Check the game's title screen to see if your copy of the game is up to date! (You should see 1.4 in the corner, please redownload the game to get the lastest version if there's another number or none) Last updated on August 15, 2015.


Gent Mini is available for FREE on Android and Ouya. Also available for iOS!
